item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Sound Postproduction ]

Per Cosi Poco was shot in under 1 week, from concept to finished project, at the Cinemadamare Festival in Italy.
I was the main camera and audio postproduction. A lot of ADR, getting rid of small noises and trying to fix everything without having a professional audio booth to record anything. Making the sound postproduction quite interesting.
It won:
Best Sound
Best Film
Best Actor
Best script
